item.title: AdventOfCode-2020
item.description: This month was quite interesting, I stopped all developemt (except office work, which is still sad, imo I should have taken a break from that too) and focused my attention towards coding challenges, by newyear have to go chennai for resuming my work life, the timing for it was the worst. what is advent of code? AOC is a series of programming challenges, two problems unlock each day, till christmas, i.
